entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 6:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.3°C
Wind: SW 31 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
